lead_paragraph: The two parties disputing the sculpture’s ownership have agreed that the statue will go to the Gagosian Gallery until the conflict is adjudicated.

headline.print_headline: Temporary Truce in Fight Over a Picasso Bust
headline.main: Temporary Agreement Reached in Custody Battle Over Picasso Bust

snippet: The two parties disputing the sculpture’s ownership have agreed that the statue will go to the Gagosian Gallery until the conflict is adjudicated.
abstract: Disputed Picasso statue will be moved to Gagosian Gallery after closing of Museum of Modern Art exhibition until legal battle over ownership is resolved; art dealer Larry Gagosian and Qatari royal family both claim to have bought piece from artist's daughter Maya Widmaier-Picasso.
